Package gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.candidate

Class SemanticClassFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.candidate.SemanticClassFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CandidateFilter

    public class SemanticClassFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements CandidateFilter
    This filter eliminates referents that are not associated with one of the pre-defined semantic classes, such as Entity. Relative pronoun mentions are eliminated regardless of whether Expression objects are allowed.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu
